name: Real car transporter cargo helicopter simulator
name_original: Real car transporter cargo helicopter simulator
description:
Get ready to play the best car transport game. Be the cargo manager on the helipad and transport cars inside the helicopter. You will be operating multiple heavy machinery in this one transport simulator.

Start off as a cargo trucker delivering cars on the helipad. Drive your transporter truck loaded with the freight to the parking. Use a forklift crane to unload the luggage from the truck and shift it to the trailer. Drive your vehicle to the helicopter and load the luggage on it. The freight also contains scrap cars to be delivered to the junkyard. Drive expensive sports car inside the big chopper. Be careful with these cars as you are responsible for their safety.

Features:
* 10 challenging car transportation missions
* Drive a big transporter truck
* Thrill of forklift crane parking
* Huge trailer driving and parking included
*Smooth and easy controls of all vehicles
